name: Out of Place in Space
description:
Controls:

Accelerate : W

Steer : mouse

Shoot : LMB

Lock Rotation : Shift

made for : the completion jam

Theme : Out of Place

use : instead of a normal health bar, pieces of your ship get shot out of place.

this is my second ever game jam, i just got back into unity this month after being away from it for a little under a year. i really appriciate any constructive critism and anything i can do to make me a dev or my game better is greatly appriciated
